relevant_findings.General: No acute distress, alert, awake, and oriented x 4, sitting up in chair.
relevant_findings.HEENT: No lymphadenopathy, trachea midline, pupils equal, round, reactive to light, extraocular movements intact.
relevant_findings.Chest: No cyanosis, no use of accessory muscles.
relevant_findings.Lungs: Clear to auscultation bilaterally on anterior and posterior exams, no increased work of breathing.
relevant_findings.Heart: Regular rate and rhythm, no murmurs, heaves, or thrills.
relevant_findings.Abdomen: (+) Bowel sounds x 4 quadrants, soft, mildly but stably distended, appropriately tender to palpation.
relevant_findings.Extremities: No pedal edema, pulses palpable in all extremities, moves all extremities against gravity.
relevant_findings.Wound Assessment: Port incisions healing well, covered with dermabond, no erythema or induration.
